247.description: Configures the bot to stay in the voice channel.

errors.not_in_voice: `‚ùå` | You must be in a voice channel to use this command.
errors.generic: `‚ùå` | An error occurred while executing this command.

messages.enabled:
`‚úÖ` | 24/7 mode has been **enabled**. 
`üéß` The bot will stay in the voice channel, even if there is no one left.

invite.content:
Invite me to your server by clicking the button below! 
In case of bugs or issues, join the support server!

support.description: Get the invite link for the support server.

clusters.description: Displays information about the shard clusters.

help.content:
Hello! I am <@{bot}>, a music bot. You can use `{prefix}help <command>` to get more information about a command.

`üëç` Vote for the bot to unlock features! [Vote Here](https://top.gg/bot/{client}/vote)
help.title: üìñ Help Menu
help.footer: Use {prefix}help <command> for more information about a command.

dj.description: Manage DJ mode and associated roles.

messages.role_exists: The DJ role <@&{roleId}> is already added.
messages.role_added: `üéß` | The DJ role <@&{roleId}> has been added.
messages.role_not_found: The DJ role <@&{roleId}> is not added.
messages.role_removed: `üóëÔ∏è` | The DJ role <@&{roleId}> has been removed.
messages.all_roles_cleared: `üßπ` | All DJ roles have been cleared.

options.add: The DJ role you want to add.
options.remove: The DJ role you want to remove.

language.invalid_language:
Please provide a valid language. Example: `EnglishUS` for English (United States)

You can find the list of supported languages [here](https://discord.com/developers/docs/reference#locales)

**Available Languages:**
{languages}
language.already_set: The language is already set to `{language}`.
language.set: `‚úÖ` | The language has been set to `{language}`.

options.language: The language you want to set.
options.reset: Reset the language to the default language.
Reset the server settings to default.

messages.reset_success: `‚úÖ` | The `{parameter}` setting has been reset successfully.
messages.reset_error: `‚ùå` | The `{parameter}` setting could not be reset. Please check the parameter name.
messages.reset_missing: `‚ùå` | You must specify a parameter to reset.

prefix.description: Displays or sets the bot's prefix.

errors.prefix_too_long: `‚ùå` | The prefix cannot be longer than 3 characters.

messages.current_prefix: The prefix for this server is `{prefix}`.
messages.prefix_set: The prefix for this server is now `{prefix}`.
messages.prefix_reset: The prefix for this server is now `{prefix}`.

options.prefix: The prefix you want to set.
options.reset: Resets the prefix to the default.

theme.choice: `‚ùå` | Invalid theme. Available themes are `classic`, `modern` and `modernpro`.
theme.set_theme: `‚úÖ` | The theme has been set to **{theme}**.
theme.reset: `‚úÖ` | The theme has been reset to **{defaultTheme}**.

options.theme: The theme to set (classic, modern or modernpro).

defaultvolume.description: Sets or resets the default volume for the server.

options.reset: Reset the default volume to the default level.

messages.set: `üîä` | The default volume has been set to {volume}.
messages.invalid_number: `‚ùå` | The volume you entered is not a valid number.
messages.too_low: `‚ùå` | The volume is too low. It must be at least 0.
messages.too_high: `‚ùå` | The volume is too high. It cannot exceed 200.
messages.reset: The default volume has been reset to {volume}.

errors.channel_exists: `‚ùå` | The song request channel already exists.
errors.channel_not_exists: `‚ùå` | The song request channel does not exist.
errors.channel_delete_fail: `‚ùå` | The song request channel has been deleted. If the channel is not deleted normally, please delete it yourself.

messages.channel_created: `üéâ` | The song request channel has been created in <#{channelId}>.
messages.channel_deleted: `üóëÔ∏è` | The song request channel has been deleted.

messages.filter_enabled:
`‚úÖ` | The bassboost filter has been **enabled**.
`‚ö†Ô∏è` | Be careful, listening too loud can damage your hearing!

options.pitch: The number you want to set the pitch to (between 0.5 and 5).

errors.invalid_number: `‚ùå` | Please provide a valid number between **0.5** and **5**.

messages.pitch_set: `‚úÖ` | The pitch has been set to **{pitch}**.

rate.description: Changes the rate of the song.

options.rate: The number you want to set the rate to (between 0.5 and 5).

errors.invalid_number: `‚ùå` | Please provide a valid number between **0.5** and **5**.

messages.rate_set: `‚úÖ` | The rate has been set to **{rate}**.

speed.description: Changes the speed of the song.

options.speed: The speed you want to set (between 0.5 and 5).

messages.invalid_number: `‚ùå` | Please provide a valid number between **0.5** and **5**.
messages.set_speed: `‚úÖ` | The speed has been set to **{speed}**.

grab.description: Gets the currently playing song in your DMs.
grab.dm_failed: I couldn't send you a DM. Make sure direct message is enabled.

join.no_voice_channel: You need to be in a voice channel to use this command.

leave.not_in_channel: I am not in a voice channel.

loop.description: Loop the current song or queue.

pause.successfully_paused: `‚è∏Ô∏è` | The song has been paused successfully.

play.description: Play a song from YouTube, Spotify or http.

options.song: The song you want to play.

errors.queue_too_long: `‚ùå` | The queue is too long. The maximum length is {maxQueueSize} songs.

playnext.description: Add the song to play next in the queue.

options.song: The song you want to play.

errors.queue_too_long: `‚ùå` | The queue is too long. The maximum length is {maxQueueSize} songs.
errors.playlist_too_long: `‚ùå` | The playlist is too long. The maximum length is {maxPlaylistSize} songs.

playnext.not_in_voice_channel: You need to be in a voice channel to use this command.

remove.description: Removes a song from the queue.

options.song: The number of the song you want to remove.

errors.no_songs: `‚ùå` | There are no songs in the queue.
errors.invalid_number: `‚ùå` | Please provide a valid song number.

messages.removed: `üóëÔ∏è` | Song number {songNumber} removed from the queue.

errors.not_seekable: `‚ùå` | Cannot replay this song because it is not seekable.

lyrics.description: Gets the lyrics of the currently playing song or a specified song.

options.song: The name of the song you want to search the lyrics for.

error.no_lyrics_found: `‚ùå` | No lyrics found for this song!
error.no_song: `‚ùå` | No song provided or currently playing.

search.not_in_voice_channel: You need to be in a voice channel to use this command.

options.song: The song you want to search for.

seek.description: Seeks to a specific time in the song.

options.duration: The duration you want to seek to.

errors.invalid_format: `‚ùå` | Invalid time format. Examples: seek 1m, seek 1h 30m
errors.beyond_duration: `‚ùå` | Cannot seek beyond the song duration of {length}.

skipto.description: Skips to a specific song in the queue.

options.number: The number of the song you want to skip to.

stop.description: Stops the music and clears the queue.

volume.description: Sets the volume of the player.

options.number: The volume you want to set.

messages.too_low: `‚ùå` | The volume cannot be lower than 0.
messages.too_high: `‚ùå` | The volume cannot be higher than 200. Do you want to damage your hearing or your speakers? Hmm, I don't think that's a good idea.

addsong.description: Adds a song to the playlist.

options.playlist: The playlist you want to add to.
options.song: The song you want to add.

options.playlist: The playlist you want to delete.

list.description: Gets all playlists of the user.

messages.invalid_username: `‚ùå` | Invalid username or user not found.
messages.invalid_userid: `‚ùå` | Unable to resolve a valid User ID.

load.not_in_voice_channel: You need to be in a voice channel to use this command.

options.playlist: The playlist you want to load.

removesong.description: Removes a song from the playlist.

options.playlist: The playlist you want to remove from.
options.song: The song you want to remove.

steal.description: Steals a playlist from another user and adds it to your playlists.

I left {client} because I was alone. 

To enable 24/7 mode, use the `24/7` command. Unlock more features with Premium.
